channel.title: C. Sean Burns, PhD: The Text, Please. Just the Text.

item.title: Not Reading
item.author: sean.csb@gmail.com
item.description:
Not Reading

March 18, 2024

I haven't been able to finish a book since the start of the year. Part of it is just how I am being in the world. A kind of mode. Sometimes I'm in a learning-by-doing mode. Sometimes I enter more of a reflective-passive mode. Right now I think I'm in the learning-by-doing mode, and a lot of that is work-related but also a lot is going on personally.

I imagine that by the time the semester ends, I'll be sick of computers again and for a while, and will finish the several novels that I have already started.
